We have described this item to the best of our ability but cannot guarantee it to appraise as such.**Thanks for visiting our store!Drawer: 2 - #41 We do appreciate your immediate payment. We strive to ship your items within 24 hours (one business day) of confirmed payment. We combine shipping whenever possible. USPS is our preferred method of shipping. Occasionally will offer UPS delivery if requested. Thanks! For our International Buyers: Please provide your telephone number either in your PayPal account payment or send it through the eBay message system. We need the contact phone number for the customs forms.Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyer’s responsibility.Please check with your country’s customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying.These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick the item up – do not confuse them for additional shipping charges.We do not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as ‘gifts’ - US and International government regulations prohibit such behavior. Please ask any questions prior to purchasing - questions are free! We strive to complete every transaction in a timely and professional manner. We appreciate your business and hope you will visit our store again! Feel free to contact us with any question or concern you may have using the "contact seller" link on this page.

ReturnPolicy.Description: ALL returns are subject to approval and a 10% restocking fee. Buyer pays all shipping and insurance fees. Items need to be securely packaged and returned  insured for the full purchase price through the shipping carrier. A tracking number must be provided within 24 hours of shipment. Return shipment must be recieved within 30 days of purchase. If present when purchased, all tags must still be attached in the original fashion, item must not be damaged, worn or used, adjusted, installed, etc or refund will not be issued. In addition: International Buyers - any custom or duty fees paid to purchase item will not be refunded and any custom or duty fees required to accept the return will be deducted from the return amount.
